QuestData.Title: Bigger Trap, Better Rewards
QuestData.Description: Good news, commander! With the materials we've gathered here in Draenor, we've been able to construct a trap strong enough to immobilize even the mightiest beast!$B$BWhy don't you head on out to Nagrand and give it a try? Word has it that the western plains are home to some of the most magnificent beasts this side of Crystal Lake.$B$BI'm going to warn you, though, these beasts are tough. You may want to bring some friends along.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Deadly Iron Trap to capture an Ironhide Bull, Direfang Alpha, or Wetland Trampler.
